setting.name: *nos_duration
setting.desc: Sets the duration of each NOS charge in seconds.

setting.name: *nos_recharge_delay
setting.desc: Sets the delay in seconds before the next NOS recharge can be used.

setting.name: *nos_recharge_duration
setting.desc: Sets the duration for the gradual NOS recharge in seconds. A value of zero means instant recharge.

setting.name: *nos_state_on_vehicle_spawn
setting.desc: Sets whether NOS should be kept when the player dies.

setting.name: *nos_state_on_vehicle_change
setting.desc: Sets whether NOS should be kept when the player changes vehicle.
